DataElement.preferredName: Patient Non Compliance Complete Visit Requirement Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator to signify willingness or ability to complete the visit requirements of a protocol

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Non Compliance Complete Visit Requirement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The treatment of a disorder by exposure to light, including ultraviolet and infrared radiation. (Bartleby.com)_A message describing how something is to be done._Requirement; something that is necessary.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time.:Requirement; something that is necessary.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Subject is not willing or abl
ReferenceDocuments.description: Subject is not willing or able to complete the visit requirements of this protocol.
